footer.description: Application Tracking System For Suckers(ATSFS) made with despair & boredom by <bold>cankurttekin</bold> to help me and you. Hope this app helps in your job hunt.

hero.title: Why use ATSFS instead of spreadsheets or just good old notes?
hero.point1: <bold>One convenient place</bold> you can access from anywhere and any device.
hero.point3: <bold>Generate</bold> personalized interview questions to prepare effectively.

extension.description: Browser extension let's you add jobs to ATSFS from job posting site(LinkedIn) with just a single click.
